title: Love's Prisoner (Wyndham Werewolf #1)

Storyline:

Love's Prisoner (Wyndham Werewolf #1)

Trapped in an elevator, Jeannie Lawrence experienced unwilling rapture at Michael Windham's hands. She never expected the devilishly handsome man to show back up in her life Â— or turn out to be a werewolf! Will she accept her destiny to be his mate?
author: MaryJanice Davidson
